Articles.Content: I turn the bunker into antimatter while you are in it. you explode into sub- atomic dust. my sub atomic hill

OOC: NOOOOOOOOOOO! Stop blowing up the hill!

I reset the hill.

No one's hill.
My hill, peasants.

A bomb kills you and the hill is unharmed. I then releases clones of me.

No one's hill. With billions of clones.

I deconstruct the hill, create a rocket that sends me to Eeloo, when it will orbit "Gas Giant 2", reconstruct the hill, then derp.

Hill = Mine

opon relising the hill has now left the planet the hill resets its self to the point where its still on the planet leaving you in space to sufficate to death

ya its my hill now because why not

I use the Thread-Starter's namesake against you. And now you're dead.

My hill now.

I send you into space, as you are a needle. I then put thousands of ultrasensitive mines and left.

The mine-infested hill.

I send wave after wave after wave of men at the hill until all the mines have detonated, then I shove you off of the hill and claim it.

My hill, thousands of craters, and thousands of dead men!

Edited December 18, 2013 by Noname117

Mt. St. Helen erupts, burying you in the pyroclastic surge.

The new hill washed by pyroclastic surge.

i grab youandflingyouint osp a ce .

myhill .

That's howb ad my internet is at emometh nt.

Get off my lawn.

*launches fireworks from the hilltop*

(Yay it's fixed!)

I scream "Never!" and fling you too.

i activate a stasis field which slows down time to the point where it might as well be frozen. traping you inside and what ever is left of the fireworks

not my hill

I then reverse engineer the stasis field into speed field, speeding everyone inside to a point where you all turned plasma. I then manage to escape to space as the speed field explodes, washing the hill.

No one's hot hill.

I deconstruct the hill, create a rocket that sends me to Eeloo, when it will orbit "Gas Giant 2", reconstruct the hill, then derp.

Hill = Mine

I build an observatory on the hill, I tie a gun to my telescope (on kerbin) and wait for the right phase angle, I pull the trigger and you die 5 years later while on EVA from a micro meteoroid

My observatory and 10,000Dv gun

I hack into the gun's mainframe and shoot you. I then tie it to a rocket which spontaneously disassembles on trajectory, destroying it. I claim de hill.

Meh Hill.

I place 100s of H-bombs at tectonic faults and destroy the earth(kerbin?) and flinging the moon(mun?) out of earth orbit

My debris field

I escape the explosion of Earth on a rocket and fly out to the moo. There I build a small colony which grows for several centuries, then they build a giant rocket motor on the mun and fly it into the debris field, causing much of it to form a ring around the moon and allowing the rest to build onto the moon.

My great-great-great-great-great-great-great-great-great-great-great-great-great grandson's moon empire and debris ring

*Flames over my head*

A flash later everything is reset.

No one's hill. Volatile hill.

*plants a tree on top of the hill*

Behold! The hill is now environmentally friendly.

I piled several trees on the hill, waiting to be planted.

No one's desert-like hill with a tree.

I put my arse on it

My desert hill with a tree

I let Jeb go crazy with solid rockets in your hill.

My semi-melted hill.

No, the hill would be made of glass, if it was a desert hill...

My glass hill.
